definition: The word "mehrmals" refers to an adverb that indicates repetition or frequency. It is commonly used to describe an action or event that occurs multiple times or on several occasions.

examples.german: Ich war schon mehrmals in Berlin.
examples.english: I have been to Berlin several times.

examples.german: Er hat mehrmals versucht, sie anzurufen.
examples.english: He tried to call her several times.

examples.german: Mehrmals am Tag muss er Medikamente einnehmen.
examples.english: He has to take medication several times a day.
The problem was discussed several times.
